name: liquidfire:Shopify
description: Create a Shopify app real easy like.

events.will-install: Your app is about to install
events.will-update: Your app is about to be updated
events.did-save-settings: Anytime your shop settings are saved (will happen during update/install)
events.did-build-api: Anytime a shopify api instance is instantiated for a particular shop.
